Program Information_Experiential Learnin: The Honours Bachelor of Food Studies embraces experiential learning as a key component of the program delivery. Students will have a variety of opportunities to examine activities in the community, take field trips in the surrounding area and complete two 16-hour community-engaged learning placements as part of their coursework.
